bin_packing.name: UR5
bin_packing.goal: packing all object in the bin

actions.push: push an {object} downward in the bin, hand must be empty when pushing
actions.fold: fold an {object}, hand must be empty when folding

blocksworld.name: UR5
blocksworld.goal: stacking blocks to be a target image

actions.pick-up: pick a {block} which is on the {table}
actions.unstack: pick a {block} which is on the {block}

hanoi.name: UR5
hanoi.goal: moving all disks of a source peg(left) to the target peg(right)

actions.slice: slice an {object} which is on the {any where}
